label: dataInterval
tooltip: This is the data acquisition period from the encoder

name: window redirect
format:
<script>
(function(scope) {
    scope.$watch('msg.payload', function(data) {
        if (data == "Node-RED") {
          //window.open("https://www.nodered.org");
          window.location.href = "https://www.nodered.org";
        } 
        if (data == "influxdb") {
          window.open("http://localhost:8086");
          //window.location.href = "https://github.com/node-red";
        } 
        
    });
})(scope);
</script>

name: Lock speed
tooltip: Lock the feed and draw speed

name: Token
info:
Note:
Ensure the path is correct
if httpAdminRoot: '/admin' is activated then 
this needs to be added to
http://localhost:1880/

name: Confirm token
info:
Restart of Node-Red flows.
Will check if the action needs security or not.
Note: if the first 5 attemps return a statuscode 403 'forbidden'
then the server will break and only way to recover is then to
restart the service

name: Restart
info:
Note:
Ensure the path is correct
if httpAdminRoot: '/admin' is activated then 
this needs to be added to
http://localhost:1880/
